Name: Saronno's Sweetheart
Ingredients: 15 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Cognac and almond with lemon, apricot and rhubarb.
History: Created in 2015 by Jamie Campbell at The Daffodil Restaurant in Cheltenham, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Saronno's Sweetheart contains 208 calories
